Test scenerio: Validate the working of login account functionality.
Test case title: Validate logging in an account with valid credentials .
Pre-requisites: 1.Open the application    (https://demo.opencart.com) in any browser.                         2.register with valid credentials.
Test steps: 1.click on my account.                                                       2.select login  from dropdown menu.                                                        3.enter valid emial and password.                                                        4.click on login  button.(er-1)
Expected result: 1.user should be logged in in account success page and proper display should be shown in the page.
